name: Weight lifting
description: Weightlifting is an athletic discipline which requires lifting of heavy weights in a progressive manner.

name: General Yoga
description: Therapeutic yoga classes are gentle and include yoga poses modified to individual's needs, gentle movement sequences to help improve the body's movement patterns, yogic breath techniques, and guided relaxation.

name: Advanced Fitness
description: Experts define physical fitness as â€œone's ability to execute daily activities with optimal performance, endurance, and strength with the management of disease, fatigue, and stress and reduced sedentary behavior.

name: Running
description: It is defined in sporting terms as a gait in which at some point all feet are off the ground at the same time. It is a form of both anaerobic exercise and aerobic exercise

name: Free Head
description: Freehand exercises consist of push-ups, dips between chairs, dips on a bench, rowing between chairs, rope climbs (if there is a gymnasium accessible!), pull-ups, knee bends

name: Advanced Yoga
description: The most dynamic and vigorous form of yoga, Ashtanga approaches yoga with a continuous flow of movement. Top athletes who seek a more intense workout enjoy this form of yoga,
